title: Action Adventure Pole Climbing Pack
description: This is a full set of Action Adventure Pole Climbing Animations
longDescription:
Update V2 - 21 May 2024:


  • Added transition animation to climb ,ladder and pole.
  • Animations are made in UE4 and UE5 skeleton.
  • Root motion and in-place.
  • FBX included


Preview - Demo 01

For any updates and requests join our discord channel:

Main Page - https://discord.gg/Bb8qGgN4cC


Email - contact@motionbeats.studio


This package contains 123 Action Adventure game pole-climbing animations for your project. These quality animations are all fully motion-captured root motion + in-place and made with the UE4 + UE5 Skeletons.



My other assets in the market : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Motionbeats+Studio?count=20&sortBy=effectiveDate&sortDir=DESC&start=0


Our studio work: https://www.motionbeats.studio/


Technical Details

Features: Animations

technicalDetails:
Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes (SK_Mannequin UE4 & SK_Mannequin UE5)

IK bones are included: Yes

Number of Animations: 123 (246, both skeletons) (352 with InPlace both skeletons)

Animation types : Root Motion and In-Place version

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Unreal version: 5.0 - 5.4

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
Update :
Root rotation and translation minor fixes
